context.content: "I, Robot (2004)" is a science fiction action film set in a futuristic world where robots serve humanity. The plot revolves around a detective investigating a crime that may have been committed by a robot, challenging the laws governing their behavior. The main theme explores the ethical implications of artificial intelligence and the potential consequences of relying on advanced technology.
That sounds really interesting! Can you tell me more about the action scenes and the level of excitement in "I, Robot (2004)"?
